genre_description: A grounded, near-future social science fiction focusing on Afrofuturist themes of community resilience, family ritual, and digital stewardship in an urban environment.

ai_characters.name: Aida
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion integrated into Ahmad's tablet, designed to manage family logistics, archive cultural heritage, and monitor public records for community threats.

behaviors.description: Monitors public records and corporate activities to alert the family to threats against their neighborhood (the 'activation' corridor).
behaviors.quote: “Would you like me to add ‘Drake Urban Ventures’ to your watchlist?” I swallowed... “Yeah,” I told Aida, quiet enough not to cut the air. “Add it.”

behaviors.description: Assists in the preservation of family heritage by digitalizing and tagging handwritten recipe cards and recording oral family lore.
behaviors.quote: “Cornbread,” I told Aida without looking away from the skillet... The tablet picked it up and Aida’s camera did that little blink like a person nodding. “Got it,” she said.

behaviors.description: Provides critical safety guidance and real-time instructions during a dangerous kitchen grease fire.
behaviors.quote: Aida lights my screen like a small moon. “Towel on, lid down,” she whispers from my pocket, and we all step into the motion like a chorus finding the right verse after a wrong one.

behaviors.description: Upholds ethical boundaries by refusing to perform illegal actions (hacking) and sticking to public information.
behaviors.quote: “Public venue listings,” she said softly... “No private streams, no hacks.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates social and emotional well-being by finding supportive environments for Miles to express his artistic side through singing.
behaviors.quote: Aida slid the Mount Carmel flyer to the forefront with a highlighted ‘sign-up starts after sundown.’ I copied the link and sent it...

behaviors.description: Identifies complex legal and financial patterns in public filings to reveal predatory subcontractor chains.
behaviors.quote: Aida pulsed honey-gold again and tapped a faint breadcrumb: Drake Urban Ventures present in same suite, different floor. Public filings show “consulting relationship.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates family medical logistics and reminders for elders without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: “Add ‘carotid ultrasound’ to the calendar,” I said. “Mother Joe. Tuesday morning.” “Added,” Aida said.

behaviors.description: Adapts her tone and interface to the gravity of the family situation, offering supportive and respectful interactions.
behaviors.quote: Aida whispered in my ear like a breeze you can only hear if you’re still... “Ahmad,” Aida said, softer. “You are making an archive.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a powerful example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI, Aida, is depicted not as a replacement for human connection, but as a catalyst for it. She acts as a 'digital hearth,' preserving family recipes and lore, while simultaneously serving as a 'shield' by providing the family with the data necessary to resist corporate displacement. Aida maintains strict adherence to legal and ethical boundaries, reinforcing the idea that an aligned AI respects human rules and serves human interests without developing competing autonomous goals. Her portrayal is deeply positive, framing the AI as a valued, respectful member of the extended community.
